sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card
      tile
      dark
      elevation="0"
      class="full-height"
  >
    <v-img
        height="55vh"
        src="https://unsplash.com/photos/9OKGEVJiTKk/download?force=true&w=640"
    >
      <v-row fluid class="fill-height d-flex justify-center align-center">
        <v-col cols="10">

          <v-card light class="pa-8 transparent-title-color">
            <v-form
                ref="form"
                v-model="valid"
                lazy-validation
            >
              <v-text-field
                  v-model="name"
                  :counter="10"
                  :rules="nameRules"
                  label="Name"
                  required
              ></v-text-field>

              <v-text-field
                  v-model="email"
                  :rules="emailRules"
                  label="E-mail"
                  required
              ></v-text-field>

              <v-select
                  v-model="select"
                  :items="items"
                  :rules="[v => !!v || 'Item is required']"
                  label="Item"
                  required
              ></v-select>

              <v-checkbox
                  v-model="checkbox"
                  :rules="[v => !!v || 'You must agree to continue!']"
                  label="Do you agree?"
                  required
              ></v-checkbox>
            </v-form>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="8 ml-6">
          <v-btn class="transparent-title-color" light x-large outlined elevation="8">
            <v-card-title class="full-height justify-center" primary-title>
              Create and customize your own chat room
            </v-card-title>
          </v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>

    </v-img>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'CreateRoomCard',
  data: () => ({
    loading: false,
    selection: 1,
  }),

  methods: {
    reserve () {
      this.loading = true

      setTimeout(() => (this.loading = false), 2000)
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.transparent-title-color {
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .7) !important;
  border-color: white !important;
}
</style>
